name: Proof 374 — Cold Morning Temperature Record | MaMeeFarm™
description:
This proof records the early morning environmental condition at MaMeeFarm™
on 23 December 2025, 06:59 AM (ICT).

The temperature dropped to 17.5°C with 74% humidity, reflecting a cold rural morning before any physical labor began.

This record represents ground-truth environmental data, captured directly on-site,
without simulation, automation, or external system intervention.

Even in a farm with no ducks left,
the reality continues — and it is recorded.

This proof is part of the DGCP™ (Data Governance & Continuous Proof) framework,
where everyday life, labor, and environment are preserved as verifiable real-world data.
